column1: Smoque BBQ////Everything else is superb.  The cornbread was the best I've had in my life
column2: and I've had some cornbread a time or ten thousand.  Holy crap.  Everything was just great.  You must go here.  It's cheap and not too far away and there's street parking...so really
column3: you have no excuse not to go.  Dine in
column6: just get up and go already!
